items.content: I like javaScript and everything web
items.content1: I am always energetic and eager to learn new skills and I use a creative approach to problem solve so I’m always coming up with innovative ideas. I am a dependable person who is great at time management also I have experience working as part of a team and individually. I am flexible in my working hours, being able to work evenings and weekends because I love my work. I am motivated to go to the yoga and gym to get fit, healthy and relax, I'm interested in painting and photography so I’m always painting my spare time.
